text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion

Haruki...
It's about time to start getting ready.
...*panting* *panting*

I'm sorry...!
I just wanted to do a little more...

No, it's okay.
Thank you for working so hard like this.
I don't want it to end...
With Luca-chan, Hana-chan, and Producer-san...

Being able to focus on lessons together,
away from our usual daily lives...
It was like a dream, so much fun.
Haha, I see...

Well then...
we'll have to do it again sometime.
Heheh, please do...!
Is there anything else we've missed?

Oh, before we leave, I want to take a photo with
Producer-san... I want to capture the memories...
Ah, that's good.

Then, here?
Right now?

Yes, this place feels like the best spot...
we've been here after all.

──Oh, but...
I'm sweating so much right now...
That's also part of the memories.

That may be true but...
s-sorry, could you wait a little longer...?
